speaker: President.
english:
President. – The debate is closed.
The vote will take place today, at 11 a.m., that is to say in a few minutes time.
(The sitting was suspended at 10.55 a.m. and resumed for voting time at 11.10 a.m.)
Written statement (Rule 142)
original:
President. – The debate is closed.
The vote will take place today, at 11 a.m., that is to say in a few minutes time.
(The sitting was suspended at 10.55 a.m. and resumed for voting time at 11.10 a.m.)

agenda_item: Promoting multilingualism and language learning in the EU (debate)
